templates.template:
interface eth0 ip address 10.10.10.116/29 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:1::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.4.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:4::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! ! logging ! log syslog log file /var/log/quagga.log log stdout ! ! -*- zebra -*- ! ! zebra sample configuration file ! ! $Id: zebra.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:30 paul Exp $ ! hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra ! ! Interface's description. ! !interface lo ! description test of desc. ! ipv6 address 5f0a::/128 ! !interface sit0 ! multicast ! !interface eth0 ! ip address 10.0.0.10/32 ! ipv6 address a::a/128
! ! Static default route sample. ! !ip route 0.0.0.0/0 203.181.89.241 ! ! -*- bgp -*- ! ! BGPd sample configuratin file ! ! $Id: bgpd.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:29 paul Exp $ ! hostname bgpd password zebra enable password zebra ! router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.116 redistribute connected ! ! Reflectors ! neighbor x.y.z.119 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.120 remote-as 65504 ! line vty

interface eth0 ip address 10.10.10.118/29 ipv6 address 2001::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.118 redistribute connected ! ! Reflectors ! neighbor x.y.z.119 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.120 remote-as 65504 ! ! External ! ! neighbor x.y.z.111 remote-as 65505 ! neighbor x.y.z.111 prefix-list allowed-in in ! ip prefix-list allowed-in seq 10 permit any ! ! logging ! log syslog log stdout ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.3.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:3::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! ! logging log syslog log file /var/log/quagga.log log stdout ! ! -*- zebra -*- ! ! zebra sample configuration file ! ! $Id: zebra.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:30 paul Exp $ ! hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra ! ! Interface's description. ! !interface lo ! description test of desc. ! ipv6 address 5f0a::/128 ! !interface sit0 ! multicast ! !interface eth0 ! ip address 10.0.0.10/32 ! ipv6 address a::a/128
! ! Static default route sample. ! !ip route 0.0.0.0/0 203.181.89.241 !
log file /tmp/zebra.log
hostname bgpd password zebra enable password zebra ! router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.118 redistribute connected ! ! Reflectors ! neighbor x.y.z.119 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.120 remote-as 65504 ! line vty

interface eth0 ip address 10.10.10.117/29 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:2::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.5.2/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:5::2/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! ! ! logging ! log syslog log file /var/log/quagga.log log stdout ! ! -*- zebra -*- ! ! zebra sample configuration file ! ! $Id: zebra.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:30 paul Exp $ ! hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra ! ! Interface's description. ! !interface lo ! description test of desc. ! ipv6 address 5f0a::/128 ! !interface sit0 ! multicast ! !interface eth0 ! ip address 10.0.0.10/32 ! ipv6 address a::a/128 ! ! Static default route sample. ! !ip route 0.0.0.0/0 203.181.89.241 ! ! -*- bgp -*- ! ! BGPd sample configuratin file ! ! $Id: bgpd.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:29 paul Exp $ ! hostname bgpd password zebra enable password zebra ! router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.117 redistribute connected ! ! Reflectors ! neighbor x.y.z.119 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.120 remote-as 65504 ! line vty

interface eth0 ip address 10.10.10.119/29 ipv6 address 2001::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.1.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:1::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.2.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:2::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! ! ! logging ! log syslog log file /var/log/quagga.log log stdout ! ! -*- zebra -*- ! ! zebra sample configuration file ! ! $Id: zebra.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:30 paul Exp $ ! hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra ! ! Interface's description. ! !interface lo ! description test of desc. ! ipv6 address 5f0a::/128 ! !interface sit0 ! multicast ! !interface eth0 ! ip address 10.0.0.10/32 ! ipv6 address a::a/128 ! ! Static default route sample. ! !ip route 0.0.0.0/0 203.181.89.241 ! ! -*- bgp -*- ! ! BGPd sample configuratin file ! ! $Id: bgpd.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:29 paul Exp $ ! hostname bgpd password zebra enable password zebra ! router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.119 network 10.10.119.0/29 redistribute connected ! ! Reflectors ! bgp cluster-id 10.10.10.0 neighbor x.y.z.120 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.120 description RR2 ! ! Clients ! neighbor x.y.z.116 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.116 description client1 neighbor x.y.z.116 route-reflector-client neighbor x.y.z.118 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.118 description client2 neighbor x.y.z.118 route-reflector-client neighbor x.y.z.117 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.117 description client3 neighbor x.y.z.117 route-reflector-client ! line vty

interface eth0 ip address 10.10.10.120/29 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:3::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. ! interface eth1 ip address 10.0.4.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:4::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. router bgp 5 bgp router-id 10.10.10.120 redistribute connected !neighbor 1.2.3.4 remote-as 555 ! ! interface eth2 ip address 10.0.5.1/24 ipv6 address 2001:0:0:5::1/64 ! BGP configuration ! You should configure the AS number below ! along with this router's peers. router bgp 5 bgp router-id 10.10.10.120 redistribute connected !neighbor 1.2.3.4 remote-as 555 ! ! ! logging ! log syslog log file /var/log/quagga.log log stdout ! ! -*- zebra -*- ! ! zebra sample configuration file ! ! $Id: zebra.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:30 paul Exp $ ! hostname Router password zebra enable password zebra ! ! Interface's description. ! !interface lo ! description test of desc. ! ipv6 address 5f0a::/128 ! !interface sit0 ! multicast ! !interface eth0 ! ip address 10.0.0.10/32 ! ipv6 address a::a/128 ! ! Static default route sample. ! !ip route 0.0.0.0/0 203.181.89.241 ! ! -*- bgp -*- ! ! BGPd sample configuratin file ! ! $Id: bgpd.conf.sample,v 1.1 2002/12/13 20:15:29 paul Exp $ ! hostname bgpd password zebra enable password zebra ! router bgp 65504 bgp router-id 10.10.10.120 network 10.10.120.0/29 redistribute connected! ! ! Reflectors ! bgp cluster-id 10.10.10.0 neighbor x.y.z.119 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.119 description RR1 ! ! Clients ! neighbor x.y.z.116 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.116 description client1 neighbor x.y.z.116 route-reflector-client neighbor x.y.z.118 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.118 description client2 neighbor x.y.z.118 route-reflector-client neighbor x.y.z.117 remote-as 65504 neighbor x.y.z.117 description client3 neighbor x.y.z.117 route-reflector-client ! line vty
